name: Typical Tea Time
description:
It's Typical Tea Time! Keep up the polite conversation by typing random English words. To score points:

- Start your word with the current letter (e.g. Tea = T, Pea = P)
- Use each word only once
- Be quick - the current letter might change!

Post your highscore below.

This game was made in 3 hours. Everything (drawings, 3d models, code) was made by me during these three hoursI used Unity Engine, DOTween, and this list of English words: https://github.com/jeremy-rifkin/Wordlist (MIT licence).
